config.installmodeDesc: Minimal installation is suitable for quick experience Rainbond
config.title: Cluster Installation configuration
config.hubDesc: Registry are required, if you have installed them in a local cluster, please provide information.
config.regionDBProviderDesc: For the supplied database, be sure to create the 'region' name library ahead of time and assign user permissions
config.regionDBDesc: The region database records region metadata, providing accessible information if other databases (such as RDS) are used
config.uiDBDesc: UI database records data center metadata, if using other databases (such as RDS, please provide accessible information)
config.uiDBProviderDesc: For the supplied database, be sure to create the 'console' name library ahead of time and assign user permissions
config.etcdProvide: Provide the existing ETCD service address
config.etcdDesc: Etcd service is required, if not provided we will install automatically
config.appDefaultDomainDesc: The default domain name is the multilevel domain name dynamically assigned by Rainbond for the HTTP class, and the default domain name dynamically creates a public DNS generic resolution record in non-offline installation mode
config.gatewayNodeDesc: Select the node installed by the Rainbond gateway service. The gateway service will occupy ports such as 80/443 of the host. By default, it is recommended to use the management node
config.gatewayIPDesc: The default domain name resolves to the IP address of all gateway nodes by default, and only to the specified IP address if specified
config.ipsearch: Search for available nodes by IP
config.chaosNodeDesc: To build the service running node, it is necessary to pull the mirror, pull the source code, and perform the mirror building task. Generally, the node with the ability to access the public network is selected, and any node in the cluster can be set by searching IP
config.accessKeyID: Fill in the AccessKeyID that has permission to create the NAS account
config.accessKeySecret: Fill in the AccessKeySecret that has permission to create the NAS account
config.nasDesc: Provide the communication key that ali cloud has the right to create Nas, and Rainbond will create the Nas controller to create the required Nas storage
config.shareStorageDesc: Shared storage provides multi-read and multi-write features for data sharing between system components and for applying global Shared storage types
config.blockStorageDesc: Block devices provide higher read and write performance for database class system components and provide extended storage types that are not required
config.aliDiskDesc: Provide the communication key of ali cloud with the permission to create cloud disk, and Rainbond will create the cloud disk required by ali cloud disk controller
config.rbdDesc: Provide information about existing Ceph RBD
config.noStorageClass: There is no available storage driver for the cluster
config.hubDomainValidation: Please enter the correct mirror repository to access the domain
config.dbAddrValidation: Please enter the database connection address
config.dbPortValidation: Please enter the database connection port
config.dbUserValidation: Please enter the database connection username
config.shareStorageValidation: Select Shared storage type is required
config.nasValidation: The NAS configuration parameters are incomplete
config.rbdValidation: The RBD block stores configuration parameters that are incomplete
config.domainValidation: Please provide a generic domain suffix that has been resolved
config.invalidValidation: The format is wrong, please type again
config.nohttpValidation: There is no need to provide HTTP protocol headers
config.diskValidation: Ali cloud disk parameter is incomplete
config.formInvalid: Configuration parameters are incomplete or invalid
